references.paper_title: Accurate structure prediction of biomolecular interactions with alphafold 3
references.reason: AlphaFold 3 is a state-of-the-art protein structure prediction method that is highly relevant to cryo-EM, as it can provide accurate structural information for use in simulation and analysis.

references.paper_title: Cryo-em reveals integrin-mediated tgf-ß activation without release from latent tgf-B
references.reason: This paper provides a high-resolution cryo-EM structure of an integrin protein, which is highly relevant to the field of cryo-EM and the development of improved methods.

references.paper_title: 2.8 å resolution reconstruction of the thermoplasma acidophilum 20s proteasome using cryo-electron microscopy
references.reason: This paper demonstrates a high-resolution cryo-EM reconstruction of a 20S proteasome, showcasing the capabilities of current cryo-EM methods and highlighting the potential for further advancements.

references.paper_title: Positive-unlabeled convolutional neural networks for particle picking in cryo-electron micrographs
references.reason: This study introduces a novel deep learning approach for particle picking in cryo-EM, significantly improving the speed and accuracy of this critical step in cryo-EM analysis.
Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) are a foundational deep learning architecture for generating synthetic data, which is highly relevant to the creation of the synthetic datasets in this work.
